frontMatter.description: How to add the ZetaChain network to your wallet.
How to connect your wallet and use it in ZetaHub.
Add tokens to liquidity pools on ZetaChain, earn fees, view pool details, and manage your positions.
Explore ZetaChain validators and delegate ZETA.
Enroll in the XP program to earn experience points by engaging with the ZetaChain ecosystem, level up through various tiers, and unlock rewards and perks for consistent participation.
Participate in activities to earn XP, including staking, trading, and engaging with apps across DeFi, Gaming, Social, NFTs, and more.
The Send page allows you to move your assets in and out of the ZetaChain network.
